title: Mukesh Ambani's fintech juggernaut starts rolling: The road ahead
description: Ambani's latest fintech business under Jio Financial Servics Ltd  (JFSL) aims to ride on extensive consumer network as well the data Reliance has acquired. The tracks that consumers leave while shopping and using Reliance products and services will form a strong databank for JFSL.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
